org.sql: SELECT note_comments.* FROM note_comments LEFT OUTER JOIN users ON users.id = note_comments.author_id WHERE note_comments.visible = "$1" AND (users.status IN ("$2", "$3") OR users.status IS NULL) AND note_comments.note_id = "$4" ORDER BY note_comments.created_at ASC

rewrites.sql: SELECT note_comments.* FROM note_comments LEFT OUTER JOIN users ON users.id = note_comments.author_id WHERE note_comments.visible = "$1" AND users.status IS NULL AND note_comments.note_id = "$4" ORDER BY note_comments.created_at ASC

SELECT note_comments.* FROM note_comments LEFT OUTER JOIN users ON users.id = note_comments.author_id WHERE note_comments.visible = "$1" AND (users.status IN ("$2", "$3") OR users.status IS NULL) AND note_comments.note_id = "$4" ORDER BY note_comments.created_at ASC LIMIT 1
